Help
----

Help provides information about the default jumper/switch setting.
Clicking on Default Jumper Setting as shown in Figure 31 will pop-up a
new window with default jumper/switch setting information as shown in
Figure 32.

|A screenshot of a computer Description automatically generated|

Figure 31: Help Frame

|A picture containing graphical user interface Description automatically
generated|

Figure 32: Default Jumper/Switch setting Window

**Note**: As shown in Figure 33, default Jumper/Switch setting window
will appear every time the tool is launched. To turn this feature OFF
permanently, check the Do not show again box and close the window.

|Graphical user interface Description automatically generated|

Figure 33: Default Jumper/Switch setting Window during Tool Launch

   :width: 7.48031in
   :height: 2.13227in
.. |A picture containing graphical user interface Description automatically generated| image:: media/image2.png
   :width: 5.11811in
   :height: 7.87571in
.. |Graphical user interface Description automatically generated| image:: media/image3.png
   :width: 5.11811in
   :height: 7.97395in
